简述：$x_{t+\Delta t}=x_t+\eta_t,\ \eta_t\sim\mathcal N(0,\sigma_q^2\Delta t)$。小步噪声下，
$p(x_{t-\Delta t}\mid x_t)\approx \mathcal N(\mu_t(x_t),\sigma_q^2\Delta t)$，
回归目标 $\arg\min_f \mathbb E\|f(x_t)-x_{t-\Delta t}\|^2$。
